arts.ttl: Martin Zubimendi reflects on summer decision to reject Liverpool transfer
arts.sum: Martin Zubimendi has revealed he has "no regrets" about turning down a transfer to Liverpool during the summer window, as well as reassuring Real Sociedad fans he has no plans to jump ship in January amid emerging Manchester City links. I made my decision from within, I thought it was the best thing to do, the results don't affect me," he added, referencing his club's poor start to the new campaign in La Liga.

arts.ttl: Ryan Gravenberch and Martin Zubimendi's 2024/25 Stats Compared
arts.sum: Ryan Gravenberch and Martin Zubimendi's 2024/25 stats have been compared, with the former enjoying a standout season so far.

arts.ttl: Martin Zubimendi clears up rumours he regretted not joining Liverpool in summer
arts.sum: Real Sociedad star Martin Zubimendi clears up rumours suggesting that he regrets not joining Liverpool in the summer.

arts.ttl: Martin Zubimendi Transfer News: Spain star explains 'uncomfortable' Arsenal and Liverpool decision
arts.sum: Last month, Zubimendi explained his decision thus: "For me, Real Sociedad is my life, I think I've spent half my life there. The midfielder has been one of the standout performers in Real Sociedad's team for several years now and was part of the Spain squad that won Euro 2024 in the summer.

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad v Anderlecht Preview: Brussels side looking to keep up Europa League momentum in the Basque country
arts.sum: Anderlecht travel to the Basque country on Thursday evening hoping to build on their opening day win in the Europa League. The Belgian’s beat Ferencvaros 2-1 at home and now…

arts.ttl: Martin Zubimendi shows true colours as he breaks silence on snubbing Liverpool transfer
arts.sum: Liverpool tried and failed with a bid to sign Martin Zubimendi in the summer and the midfield maestro has now explained why he chose to stay put with Real Sociedad

arts.ttl: Martin Zubimendi addresses wild rumours he 'regrets rejecting Liverpool' - after £52m midfielder opted to stay with Real Sociedad for the 'food and hikes'
arts.sum: Real Sociedad midfielder Martin Zubimendi insists he has zero regrets about turning down a move to Liverpool in the summer despite his side's poor start to the season.

arts.ttl: Martin Zubimendi opens up on decision to reject summer move to Liverpool
arts.sum: One of the biggest Spanish football transfer stories of the summer involved Martin Zubimendi. The Real Sociedad pivot was heavily linked with a move to Liverpool, and at one stage, it seemed certain that he would join the Premier League giants. However, he ended up showing loyalty to La Real once again, and he stayed […] The post Martin Zubimendi opens up on decision to reject summer move to Liverpool appeared first on Football España.
